universal.label: Orient
universal.description: Helps the user locate themselves in the moment. Orientation, grounding, context.

universal.label: Return
universal.description: Brings the user back to centre. A reset, a re-entry, a gentle snap-to-now.

universal.label: Choose
universal.description: Creates choice space. Pauses autopilot and opens options.

universal.label: Move
universal.description: Supports action. Micro-step, runnable behaviour, next right move.

universal.label: Prove
universal.description: Captures proof/receipt. Consolidates change through evidence the brain trusts.

universal.label: Repair
universal.description: Restores connection or integrity. Relational repair, self-repair, boundary repair.

universal.label: Reflect
universal.description: Meaning-making and insight. Contemplation, integration, perspective shift.

universal.label: Calm
universal.description: Soft, quiet, low-cognitive-load. Non-triggering. Minimal urgency.

universal.label: Strong
universal.description: Grounded authority. Confident. Clean edges. No fluff.

universal.label: Moment
universal.description: Designed for in-the-moment use. Fast. Runnable under real life.

universal.label: Session
universal.description: Designed to support between-session or clinician workflows. Review, reflection, coherence.

universal.label: System
universal.description: Designed for organisational continuity. Governance, reliability, defensibility.
